metadata.subject: Censorship
Unigenitus (Papal bull) 1713
metadata.title: Sentence du Chastelet de Paris, qui condamne un ecrit imprimé, ayant pour titre: Mandement & instruction pastorale de Monseigneur l'Archevêque de Paris, touchant l'autorité de l'Eglise, l'enseignement de la foi, l'administration des sacrements, la soumission due à la Constitution Unigentius, portant défenses de lire plusiers ecrits, &c. à être lacéré & brûlé en place de greve, par l'exécuteur de la haute-justice
metadata.creator: Paris (France).Châtelet
Paris (France). Châtelet
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1746-1781 : Beaumont)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 6 no. 97
metadata.description: Captiion title. Imprint at foot of p. 3
metadata.notes: No table-of-contents pages found. No copyright page found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
